autonomous_agent_apis.name: OpenAI Agents
autonomous_agent_apis.description: OpenAI provides models with agentic strengths, allowing systems to intelligently accomplish tasks including complex, open-ended workflows.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: LangChain
autonomous_agent_apis.description: An open source framework enabling developers to build, test, and deploy reliable AI agents with integration for LLMs.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: CrewAI
autonomous_agent_apis.description: CrewAI makes it easy for enterprises to operate teams of AI agents that perform complex tasks autonomously with full control.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: AutoGen
autonomous_agent_apis.description: A programming framework for developing applications using AI agents, facilitating cooperation among multiple agents.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Semantic Kernel
autonomous_agent_apis.description: A lightweight SDK that allows integration of AI Large Language Models (LLMs) with conventional programming languages.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: LlamaIndex
autonomous_agent_apis.description: A developer-first agent framework that accelerates the production of GenAI applications with trusted abstractions.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: SuperAGI
autonomous_agent_apis.description: A dev-first open source autonomous AI agent framework enabling developers to build, manage & run useful autonomous agents.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: AgentFlow
autonomous_agent_apis.description: Designed around atomicity, it is a lightweight framework for building agentic AI pipelines.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Rasa
autonomous_agent_apis.description: An open-source machine learning framework for building contextual assistants and chatbots.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: Atomic Agents
autonomous_agent_apis.description: A modular framework for building and deploying AI agent systems that breaks down complex workflows.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: LangGraph
autonomous_agent_apis.description: A framework for building complex applications using a graph-based approach.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: PydanticAI
autonomous_agent_apis.description: An AI framework built around Pydantic, allowing for the creation of type-safe AI applications.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: SmolAgents
autonomous_agent_apis.description: A minimalistic framework for building lightweight agents that can perform specific tasks.

autonomous_agent_apis.name: MetaGPT
autonomous_agent_apis.description: MetaGPT is a framework designed for building intelligent agents using meta-learning techniques.
